Text.Page:
Friend, the Enlightened Union needs assistance, if we are to succeed in procuring noctenium.

We have installed noctenium extractors on our land here, but they are constantly beset by huge beasts areâ€”mainly basilisks. The damage they causing is preventing us from collecting noctenium. Please, stop these creatures from interfering with the extractors!

If level 65 Union members were to assist lower level members of the Enlightened Union in the completion of this task, their rewards would include this bonus reward.

Thank you, friend !
With your help, the union will surely prevail.
Praise the Enlightened Union!
